channel.description: Recent content in course on Alvin's Site

item.title: Princeton: ALGORITHMS, Part 1
item.description: get in the mindset of being an active participant who writes and debugs code, solves problems, studies the available resources, and engages in the discussion forums, as opposed to a passive participant who just watches the lectures. to be continued… 1 introduction This lecture focuses on why we learn about algorithms. They may unlock the secrets of life and of the universe. This reason really motivates me. Also, building an aesthetic about algorithms.
